name: chunker-app
description: Parent package of the Chunker Electron app and user interface.
author: Hive Games Limited <chunker-public@hivemc.com>

scripts.start: concurrently "cross-env BROWSER=none npm start --prefix ui" "npx wait-on http://127.0.0.1:3000 && cross-env DEV_UI_URL=http://localhost:3000 DEV_CLI_EXECUTABLE=../../cli/build/libs/ npm start --prefix electron"
scripts.start:web: npm run build --prefix ui && npm start --prefix web
scripts.build: npm run build --prefix ui && npm run publish --prefix electron
scripts.build:web: npm run build --prefix ui && npm install --prefix web
